summary: This is an email dated August 12, 2019, with the subject referencing Jeffrey Epstein by his full name and federal registration number, and containing an attachment described as an 'Updated time line.' The email was sent shortly after Epstein's death in custody, suggesting it pertains to timeline updates related to his case or death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Edward Epstein
persons.context: The email subject line identifies him by his full name and federal registration number (76318-054X), indicating he is the central subject of the communication and the attached timeline.

events.title: Email sent regarding Epstein timeline
events.description: An email is sent with the subject 'Epstein, Jeffrey Edward, Reg. No. 76318-054X' and an attachment described as an 'Updated time line.'

keyFacts: The document is an email dated August 12, 2019, which is shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody on August 10, 2019.
The email subject includes Epstein's full name and his federal Bureau of Prisons registration number (76318-054X).
The email contains an attachment described as an 'Updated time line,' likely related to events in Epstein's case or the circumstances surrounding his death.
